title: Welcome
description: Hi, I'm Wojtek. I'm glad you found my website.
aboutMe1: Working on the frontend and UI side, implementing user interfaces and customizing them to project requirements. Implementing new features and improving existing code to enhance gameplay and user experience.
aboutMe2: Coordinating collaboration between teams of developers, graphic designers, and animators to effectively implement solutions into games. Time management, working with backlogs, and creating technical documentation.
aboutMe3: Participating in the production and deployment of 6 completed game projects, including both the development of new titles and the enhancement of existing productions. Troubleshooting and debugging. Introducing optimizations and code refactoring.
